paper_metadata.title: Epigenetic profiling of Italian patients identified methylation sites associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the Val30Met mutation in the TTR gene, its impact on methylation, and provides insights into penetrance data among carriers.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation disrupts a methylation site, causing significant hypomethylation.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on methylation changes and clinical correlation.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the role of epigenetic regulation in hATTR and the impact of the Val30Met mutation.
key_quotes: Val30Met disrupts a methylation site, cg13139646, causing a drastic hypomethylation in carriers of this amyloidogenic mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on the TTR gene and provided relevant data.
